Name: Yohana Marisela
description:
Yohana is 20 years old, she lives with her partner and she has a son who depends on both of them. Her partner works raising cattle.
For the last year Yohana has worked making and selling typical snacks, she learned this from a relative of hers. She works 3 days a week. In addition, she makes products with crochet fabric that a friend of hers taught her.
She will use this loan to buy threads of different colors, some blankets, needles and molds to make more crochet products.
Yohana dreams of having her own home.
